title: Topic 001 Question 166
body: A company is releasing a new static website hosted on Amazon S3. The static website hosting feature was enabled on the bucket and content was uploaded; however, upon navigating to the site, the following error message is received:
What change should be made to fix this error?
options: Add a bucket policy that grants everyone read access to the bucket.
Add a bucket policy that grants everyone read access to the bucket objects.
Remove the default bucket policy that denies read access to the bucket.
Configure cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) on the bucket.
